thread.title: Gauahar Khan becomes proud owner of Audi Q7 Limited Edition
thread.title_full: Gauahar Khan becomes proud owner of Audi Q7 Limited Edition - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Gauahar Khan becomes proud owner of Audi Q7 Limited Edition
text:
TV actress and model Gauahar Khan , who had won the seventh season of hit reality show Bigg Boss , has all the reasons to be on cloud nine these days.
The gorgeous actress just became a proud owner of a brand new Audi Q7 Limited Edition.
READ ALSO: Gauahar Khan buys a new house; see pics of the housewarming party
Gauahar hinted about this last night by tweeting "Gonna share a great joy with you guys today Every dream that id seen as a kid, Allah has helped me achieve it!!!! #Alhamdulillah ðŸŒŸ"
Gonna share a great joy with you guys today Every dream that id seen as a kid, Allah has helped me achieve it!!!! #Alhamdulillah ðŸŒŸ
â€” GAUAHAR KHAN (@GAUAHAR_KHAN) February 16, 2017 She recently snapchatted the picture of her new car and she is thrilled about it.
Gauahar, went with her bestie Bani J , first runner-up of Bigg Boss 10 to get the beauty from the showroom.
Even Bani snapchatted the same.
Well, that's a priced possession for Gauahar now.
